description: The cobbitty daisy is an amazing plant species for its resilience and versatility. Growing as a perennial in most areas, this plant can reach up to 1-2 feet with daisy-like flowers (up to 4 inches) which will bloom in colors such as white, yellow, and pink. It is tolerant of drought and can be grown in just about any soil type. It is an excellent plant for the novice lower maintenance gardener and with it's long flowering period (3-4 months), it is sure to bring lots of joy and color to your outdoor space!
